The claim was propagated by a Twitter ha: Hindu1stPalghar) and received significant engagement with over 1,200 retweets and more than 2,000 likes in a short period of time.

The Bhim Army chief: Chandrashekhar Azad himself, mocked the claim on Twitter, stating that his real name being Naseemuddin Khan was false.
